definition: a drum tower/Drum Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
surname Lou
Drumtower city district (various)/Gulou district of Nanjing City 南京市[Nan2 jing1 shi4], Jiangsu/Gulou or Drumtower district of Fuzhou city 福州市[Fu2 zhou1 shi4], Fujian

sentences.english: It looks like the drums in Drum Tower in Xi'An.
sentences.chinese: 它看上去很像西安鼓樓裏的鼓。

sentences.english: When you climb up to the balcony of the drum tower, you are at the central point of Old Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 登上鼓樓的觀景臺，你就站在了天津的中心。

sentences.english: Shall we go to Gulou Hospital by taxi? All right.
sentences.chinese: 我們乘出租車去鼓樓醫院，好嗎？好的。

sentences.english: Following the imperial road leisurely, the drum-tower seems deserted yet the bell still sounds.
sentences.chinese: 沿着帝王故道慢慢走來，鼓樓蒼然，鐘聲依舊。

sentences.english: Brothers tobacco pipe, this is on the drum tower avenue a multi-faceted shop.
sentences.chinese: 兄弟菸斗，這是鼓樓大街上頗具特色的一家小店。

sentences.english: There are quite a few featurde small restaurants on Gulou Street.
sentences.chinese: 鼓樓大街上有很多喫飯的小餐廳。

sentences.english: The construction and underground structure design of bell and drum tower square are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 西安鐘鼓樓廣場及地下工程是西安市重點工程。

sentences.english: "Clock Drum Tower" was the representative work of this stage.
sentences.chinese: 這個階段的代表作是《鐘鼓樓》。

sentences.english: These two timers were a reference to the Drum Tower and Bell Tower.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個計時器關係到鐘樓和鼓樓。

sentences.english: Later, the drum was no longer used to tell time but only to give warnings in times of war.
sentences.chinese: 後來鼓樓不再用來報時，只是在戰爭時才擂鼓報警。

sentences.english: Drum Tower in Beijing Chinese medicine hospital near the inside, soup medicine is required.
sentences.chinese: 就在北京鼓樓附近的中醫院裏面，喝湯藥也行。

sentences.english: 5 p.m - A 15-minute walk from Nanluo Guxiang are the city's old drum and bell towers.
sentences.chinese: 從南鑼鼓巷步行15分鐘即可到達鐘鼓樓。

sentences.english: With the two towers rivaling each other, the ancient city of Xi'an is even more beautiful and spectacular than ever before.
sentences.chinese: 鐘樓的鼓樓交相輝映，使古城西安更加美麗壯觀。

sentences.english: Except that the Bell Building remains the architecture style of the late Qing Dynasty;
sentences.chinese: 除了鐘鼓樓保持完整晚清建築風格外。

sentences.english: In the third layer of Gulou , we found the bell and took many pictures.
sentences.chinese: 在鼓樓的三層，我們找到了那口鐘並拍了許多照片。

sentences.english: The Drum Tower is now a historical monument in Shaanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 鼓樓現在是陝西省重點文物保護單位。

definition: Zhonglou district of Changzhou city 常州市[Chang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
bell tower/campanile/clock tower/Bell Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
Tiananmen Gate, entrance of the Imperial City in Beijing
neighborhood/district
tavern/guest house/inn/hotel
Zhongshan Park, the name of numerous parks in China, honoring Sun Yat-sen 孫中山|孙中山[Sun1 Zhong1 shan1]
bridge/CL:座[zuo4]
Tianqiao district of Jinan city 濟南市|济南市[Ji3 nan2 shi4], Shandong/Tianqiao district in Beijing, formerly a center of folk culture
overhead walkway/pedestrian bridge
public square/plaza
Qianmen subway station on Beijing Subway Line 2
front door/main entrance/honest and upright approach (as opposed to 後門|后门, back-door or under the counter)
there
Houhai, a lake and the area surrounding it in central Beijing
city wall
gongs and drums/Chinese percussion instruments
over there/yonder
vendor's stall
river bank
